18.str2: To hear, listen, comprehend by hearing; pass: is heard, reported. A primary verb; to hear.
Probably akin to phaino through the idea of disclosure; a tone; by implication, an address, saying or language.
From out, out from among, from, suggesting from the interior outwards. A primary preposition denoting origin, from, out.
Perhaps from the same as oros; the sky; by extension, heaven; by implication, happiness, power, eternity; specially, the Gospel.

18.parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Plural
18.str2: I am, exist. The first person singular present indicative; a prolonged form of a primary and defective verb; I exist.
With. A primary preposition denoting union; with or together.

18.parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Dative Masculine 3rd Person Singular
18.str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.
In, on, among. A primary preposition denoting position, and instrumentality, i.e. A relation of rest; 'in, ' at, on, by, etc.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
Set apart by (or for) God, holy, sacred. From hagos; sacred.
A mountain, hill. Probably from an obsolete oro; a mountain: -hill, mount(-ain).

19.parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 1st Person Plural
19.str2: To have, hold, possess. Including an alternate form scheo skheh'-o; a primary verb; to hold.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
From lego; something said; by implication, a topic, also reasoning or motive; by extension, a computation; specially, the Divine Expression.
Prophetic, uttered by a prophet. From prophetes; pertaining to a foreteller.
Firm, steadfast, enduring, sure, certain. From the base of basis; stable.

19.parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 2nd Person Plural
19.str2: (a) I make, manufacture, construct, (b) I do, act, cause. Apparently a prolonged form of an obsolete primary; to make or do.
Well, nobly, honorably, rightly. Adverb from kalos; well.

19.parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Plural
19.str2: From pros and echo; to hold the mind towards, i.e. Pay attention to, be cautious about, apply oneself to, adhere to.

19.parse: Personal / Relative Pronoun - Dative Masculine Singular
19.str2: Who, which, what, that.
Probably adverb of comparative from hos; which how, i.e. In that manner.
A lamp. From the base of leukos; a portable lamp or other illuminator.

19.parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Dative Masculine Singular
19.str2: Prolongation for the base of phos; to lighten, i.e. Show.
In, on, among. A primary preposition denoting position, and instrumentality, i.e. A relation of rest; 'in, ' at, on, by, etc.
From auchmos; properly, dirty, i.e. obscure.
Apparently a primary word; a spot, i.e. Location; figuratively, condition, opportunity; specially, a scabbard.
A conjunction, preposition and adverb of continuance, until.

19.parse: Personal / Relative Pronoun - Genitive Masculine Singular
19.str2: Who, which, what, that.
A day, the period from sunrise to sunset.

19.parse: Verb - Aorist Subjunctive Active - 3rd Person Singular
19.str2: To shine through, dawn (of the light coming through the shadows). From dia and augazo; to glimmer through, i.e. Break.
And, even, also, namely.
(lit: light-bearing), radiant, the morning-star. From phos and phero; light-bearing, i.e., the morning-star.

19.parse: Verb - Aorist Subjunctive Active - 3rd Person Singular
19.str2: To make to rise, I rise, shine (generally of the sun, and hence met.). From ana and the base of telos; to arise.
In, on, among. A primary preposition denoting position, and instrumentality, i.e. A relation of rest; 'in, ' at, on, by, etc.

19.parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive 2nd Person Plural
19.str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.
Prolonged from a primary kar; the heart, i.e. the thoughts or feelings; also the middle.

20.str2: First, in the first place, before, formerly. Neuter of protos as adverb; firstly.

20.parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Plural
20.str2: A prolonged form of a primary verb; to 'know' in a great variety of applications and with many implications.
Neuter of hostis as conjunction; demonstrative, that; causative, because.
No, not. Also ouk, and ouch a primary word; the absolute negative adverb; no or not.
Prophecy, prophesying; the gift of communicating and enforcing revealed truth. From prophetes; prediction.
(a) a writing, (b) a passage of scripture; plur: the scriptures. A document, i.e. Holy Writ.

20.parse: Verb - Present Indicative Middle or Passive - 3rd Person Singular
20.str2: A prolongation and middle voice form of a primary verb; to cause to be, i.e. to become, used with great latitude.
Pertaining to self, i.e. One's own; by implication, private or separate.
Solution, explanation, interpretation; release. From epiluo; explanation, i.e. Application.

21.str2: For. A primary particle; properly, assigning a reason.
No, not. Also ouk, and ouch a primary word; the absolute negative adverb; no or not.
Prophecy, prophesying; the gift of communicating and enforcing revealed truth. From prophetes; prediction.
At one time or other, at some time, formerly. From the base of pou and te; indefinite adverb, at some time, ever.

21.parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Passive - 3rd Person Singular
21.str2: To carry, bear, bring; I conduct, lead; perhaps: I make publicly known. A primary verb.
An act of will, will; plur: wishes, desires. From the prolonged form of ethelo; a determination, i.e. choice or inclination.
But, except, however. Neuter plural of allos; properly, other things, i.e. contrariwise.
A man, one of the human race. From aner and ops; man-faced, i.e. A human being.

21.parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Plural
21.str2: A prolonged form of an otherwise obsolete verb; to talk, i.e. Utter words.
From, away from. A primary particle; 'off, ' i.e. Away, in various senses.
A deity, especially the supreme Divinity; figuratively, a magistrate; by Hebraism, very.

21.parse: Verb - Present Participle Middle or Passive - Nominative Masculine Plural
21.str2: To carry, bear, bring; I conduct, lead; perhaps: I make publicly known. A primary verb.
A primary preposition; under, i.e. of place, or with verbs; of place (underneath) or where (below) or time (when).
Set apart by (or for) God, holy, sacred. From hagos; sacred.
